segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 5
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 5

segments.pli: 17. Āghātavagga
segments.en: 17. Resentment

segments.pli: 170. Bhaddajisutta
segments.en: 170. With Bhaddaji

segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Ānanda was staying near Kosambi, in Ghosita’s Monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho āyasmā bhaddaji yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā ānandena saddhiṃ sammodi.
segments.en: Then Venerable Bhaddaji went up to Venerable Ānanda, and exchanged greetings with him.

segments.pli: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho āyasmantaṃ bhaddajiṃ āyasmā ānando etadavoca:
segments.en: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side, and Venerable Ānanda said to him:

segments.pli: “kiṃ nu kho, āvuso bhaddaji, dassanānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ savanānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ sukhānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ saññānaṃ aggaṃ, kiṃ bhavānaṃ aggan”ti?
segments.en: “Reverend Bhaddaji, what is the best sight, the best sound, the best happiness, the best perception, and the best state of existence?”

segments.pli: “Atthāvuso, brahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī, yo taṃ brahmānaṃ passati, idaṃ dassanānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: “Reverend, there is this Brahmā, the undefeated, the champion, the universal seer, the wielder of power. When you see Brahmā, that’s the best sight.

segments.pli: Atthāvuso, ābhassarā nāma devā sukhena abhisannā parisannā.
segments.en: There are the gods called ‘of streaming radiance’, who are drenched and steeped in pleasure.

segments.pli: Te kadāci karahaci udānaṃ udānenti:
segments.en: Every so often they feel inspired to exclaim:

segments.pli: ‘aho sukhaṃ, aho sukhan’ti.
segments.en: ‘Oh, what bliss! Oh, what bliss!’

segments.pli: Yo taṃ saddaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ savanānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: When you hear that, it’s the best sound.

segments.pli: Atthāvuso, subhakiṇhā nāma devā.
segments.en: There are the gods called ‘replete with glory’.

segments.pli: Te santaṃyeva tusitā sukhaṃ paṭivedenti, idaṃ sukhānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: Since they’re truly content, they experience pleasure. This is the best happiness.

segments.pli: Atthāvuso, ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā devā, idaṃ saññānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: There are the gods reborn in the dimension of nothingness. This is the best perception.

segments.pli: Atthāvuso, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanūpagā devā, idaṃ bhavānaṃ aggan”ti.
segments.en: There are the gods reborn in the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception. This is the best state of existence.”

segments.pli: “Sameti kho idaṃ āyasmato bhaddajissa, yadidaṃ bahunā janenā”ti?
segments.en: “So, Venerable Bhaddaji, do you agree with what most people say about this?”

segments.pli: “Āyasmā kho ānando bahussuto.
segments.en: “Well, Venerable Ānanda, you’re very learned.

segments.pli: Paṭibhātu āyasmantaṃyeva ānandan”ti.
segments.en: Why don’t you clarify this yourself?”

segments.pli: “Tenahāvuso bhaddaji, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
segments.en: “Well then, Reverend Bhaddaji, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”

segments.pli: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā bhaddaji āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
segments.en: “Yes, reverend,” Bhaddaji replied.

segments.pli: Āyasmā ānando etadavoca:
segments.en: Ānanda said this:

segments.pli: “Yathā passato kho, āvuso, anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ dassanānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: “What you see when the defilements end in the present life is the best sight.

segments.pli: Yathā suṇato anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ savanānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: What you hear when the defilements end in the present life is the best sound.

segments.pli: Yathā sukhitassa anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ sukhānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: The happiness you feel when the defilements end in the present life is the best happiness.

segments.pli: Yathā saññissa anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ saññānaṃ aggaṃ.
segments.en: What you perceive when the defilements end in the present life is the best perception.

segments.pli: Yathā bhūtassa anantarā āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, idaṃ bhavānaṃ aggan”ti.
segments.en: The state of existence in which the defilements end in the present life is the best state of existence.”

segments.pli: Dasamaṃ.
Āghātavaggo dutiyo.
Dve āghātavinayā,
sākacchā sājīvato pañhaṃ;
Pucchā nirodho codanā,
sīlaṃ nisanti bhaddajīti.
